entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:04 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 03:00 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
